text: And a Little Child Shall Lead Them is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithAnd a Little Child Shall Lead ThemRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Marion Leonard, Arthur V. Johnson, and Adele DeGarde. ==Actors== * Marion Leonard as The Mother * Arthur V. Johnson as The Father * Adele DeGarde as The Daughter * David Miles as The Lawyer * Anita Hendrie as The Maid * Mack Sennett as The Servant * Florence Lawrence * John Tansey ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: And a Little Child Shall Lead Them
